title: Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island
description: You’re shipwrecked on a lost mythical island. As backpacker Alex, you must befriend the forgotten gods of Greek mythology and restore their memories. Explore the dynamic island and its story sandbox to build new friendships, solve the mystery and save the gods.
longDescription:
<!--image-->
![Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island-vn3mw](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/d0cab3d7417a41f1a5dfb51b7a33fa94/mythwrecked-ambrosia-island-vn3mw.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# THE GODS ARE REAL, THEY’VE JUST BEEN ON VACATION
<!--text-->
You’re Alex, a rookie backpacker taking a much needed break from modern life. Your trip is interrupted when you are suddenly shipwrecked on Ambrosia Island; a beautiful long-forgotten place of myth and sunshine. It’s home to the gods of Greek mythology. They’re real after all, even if they are having an identity crisis.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Can you discover the secrets of Ambrosia Island in this sun-drenched 'Friend Em Up' adventure?

<!--image-->
![Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island-13hbh](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/d0cab3d7417a41f1a5dfb51b7a33fa94/mythwrecked-ambrosia-island-13hbh.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# GAMEPLAY - TREASURE HUNT
<!--text-->
Sometimes, even gods need a friend. Many call the island home; from Ares to Athena, Hermes to Hades, although some may be harder to meet than others. Can you help return their lost memories and reconnect their fractured family?

- Control Alex to explore a 3D island with your trusty Ambrosidex device in hand.
- Find each of the island’s inhabitants and add their personal signal to your Ambrosidex. Some Gods may be harder to reach than others!
- Use the Ambrosidex’s radar signal to find your new friends' lost treasures hidden around the island.
- Return the mementos to their correct owner to jog their memories, trigger flashbacks, and reveal the story of the island’s curse.
- Can you wake the gods, lift the curse, and find a way home?

<!--image-->
![Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island-6zyuj](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/d0cab3d7417a41f1a5dfb51b7a33fa94/mythwrecked-ambrosia-island-6zyuj.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# GAMEPLAY - STORY SANDBOX
<!--text-->
Why did the Gods lose their memories? How did they become so fearful of one another? What happened here? Search the island for long-lost mementos to rekindle the memories of your new friends and uncover the truth, and maybe a way home.

- As you explore the island Alex can examine new objects and locations she discovers and talk to the characters she meets to unlock new conversation topics.
- You can then ask the island’s inhabitants about any new topics you have found.
- Maybe they’ll know something that will help Alex on her adventure, although some sensitive topics may be off limits until you have earned their friendship.
- Play detective and uncover the mysteries of the island with this unique non-linear narrative gameplay.

<!--image-->
![Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island-81grm](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/d0cab3d7417a41f1a5dfb51b7a33fa94/mythwrecked-ambrosia-island-81grm.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# EXPLORE THE ISLAND AND RETURN IT TO ITS FORMER GLORY
<!--text-->
The island of Ambrosia is a wonderful place packed full of mystery and secrets, from its turquoise shores to the heights of its ancient temple walls. The island is idyllic, but the temple of the gods has seen better days. Can you be the unlikely hero to return it to its legendary former glory and win the friendship of the gods in the process?

- Ambrosia Island has a dynamic day/night cycle, some locations and puzzles may only be accessible at certain times of day
- Perform odd jobs and friendship favours for your new friends to restore their island to its former glory

<!--image-->
![Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island-k6tty](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/d0cab3d7417a41f1a5dfb51b7a33fa94/mythwrecked-ambrosia-island-k6tty.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# EMOTIONAL STORYTELLING
<!--text-->
The game weaves an emotional story of the importance of friendship, family, and community. Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island is the second game from Polygon Treehouse and developers of the multi-award winning and double BAFTA-nominated narrative adventure game Röki.

<!--image-->
![Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island-f2002](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/d0cab3d7417a41f1a5dfb51b7a33fa94/mythwrecked-ambrosia-island-f2002.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# AN ADVENTURE FOR ALL
<!--text-->
Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island is an adventure game for ALL gamers - with its non-violent gameplay, accessible controls, and universal themes.. The game is designed uniquely to pose a challenge but to also offer a helping hand when players need it.
